text: Fiona Hughes is a senior lecturer in philosophy and Director of Education for Philosophy at the University of Essex. In January 2017, Hughes was on the expert panel for BBC Radio 4's In Our Time on Nietzsche's Genealogy of Morality. == Selected publications == * * * == References == Category:Academics of the University of Essex Category:British women academics Category:British women philosophers Category:21st-century philosophers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Fiona Hughes (academic)
